version_description:
New to iOS! Hungry Dragon – the action-packed eat ‘em up of food, flight and flame
Help us make the game better by leaving a review or contacting us on Social Media!

The Hungry Dragon gang is growing! In this update:
• New Dragon: Meet Jawfrey the jaw-dropping giant!
• More Missions
• Improved Dragon Selection Menu
• Play while listening to your own music!
• Medieval modifications and fiery fixes

Spring has sprung and things are heating up! In this update:
• New Pets: Boost your predatory power with Springling & Fawn Travolta!
• New Area: Explore the Shadow Caves!
• Added signposts to guide your way!
• Spring Events and Eggs!

Spring has sprung and things are heating up! In this update:
• New Pets: Boost your predatory power with Springling & Fawn Travolta!
• New Area: Explore the Shadow Caves!
• Added signposts to guide your way!
• Spring Events and Eggs!
Live Events added & bugs fixed!
Live Events added & Bugs fried!

What's Hot in this Update?
- Tournaments: a brand new mode - complete challenges for great rewards!
- Level-Up: now your Dragons get bigger, faster, stronger as they gain levels!
- And Jalapeños are back - because apparently some like it even hotter!

What's Hot in this Update?
- Passive Events: new events which temporarily increase stats & rewards!
- Dragon Size Changes: Don Drago is now M; Blaze is L; and Poseidran is XL!
- Tasty tweaks and fiery fixes!
New Tournament types added & polishes made!

Welcome to Hungry Dragon – the action-packed eat ‘em up of food, flight and flame!
Help us improve the game by leaving a review or contacting us on Social Media!
Welcome to Hungry Dragon – the action-packed eat ‘em up of food, flight and flame! Help us improve the game by leaving a review or contacting us on Social Media!

A NEW DRAGON HAS LANDED
Goldheist - hoarder of all things shiny!

BE THE DRAGON
Transform your face into your favorite Dragon! (Certain devices only)

DETECTIVE PETS
Locate Eggs, Chests & Hungry Letters faster!

Stay tuned for some spooky events!
Live Events added & Bugs fried!

UNLEASH LEGENDARY POWER
Discover Legendary Dragons, huge upgradable hybrids with special powers!

UNLEASH LEGENDARY POWER
Discover Legendary Dragons, huge upgradable hybrids with special powers!

The weather outside is frightful, but the FIRE is so delightful…

In this update: Winter Events, Seasonal Pets & Festive Discounts!
Hungry Dragon allies with upcoming feature film The Kid Who Would Be King to bring you legendary new content & events!

Let's celebrate the Year of the Pig!
In this update:
- The adorable new Pet Pig!
- Lunar New Year Tournaments & Quests!
- Festive fireworks & decorations!
- And a new animated face: Zhe Long!

Let's celebrate the Year of the Pig!
In this update:
- The adorable new Pet Pig!
- Lunar New Year Tournaments & Quests!
- Festive fireworks & decorations!
- And a new animated face: Zhe Long!

- New Legendary Dragon: Armordillo, the armored oddball with a pinball attack!
- Leagues: crush other players by beating their top scores!
- Spring Pets & Events!

- St Patrick's Day: new events & surprises!
- Daily Treasure: rewards for logging in every day!
- Improved Dragon controls!

- St Patrick's Day: new events & surprises!
- Daily Treasure: rewards for logging in every day!
- Improved Dragon controls!

NEW XXL DRAGON
This Winter in Dragonheim, things are getting stranger!
Anomalyis has landed - the aggressive extra-terrestrial with out-of-this-world eating power!

IT'S HUNGRY HALLOWEEN!
- Creepy Costumes for Blaze, Poseidran & Draconis
- Defeat Zombies & Collect Pumpkins!
- Halloween Pets: Morta, Irving & Madwrap are back!
- Improved Menu: Legendary Dragons now on main screen
- Leagues Expanded: now play with any Dragon!

IT'S HUNGRY HALLOWEEN!
- Creepy Costumes for Blaze, Poseidran & Draconis
- Defeat Zombies & Collect Pumpkins!
- Halloween Pets: Morta, Irving & Madwrap are back!
- Improved Menu: Legendary Dragons now on main screen
- Leagues Expanded: now play with any Dragon!

Coming this Summer to Hungry Dragon:

- NEW DRAGON: T-Wreks, the rampaging tyrannosaurus with a jurassic jetpack!
- Special Summer Surprises: Pets, Events & more!

- NEW DRAGON: Icebreaker, the frozen beast of the North!
- Goblin War: new special tournaments!
- Easter events & egg hunts!

- NEW DRAGON: Icebreaker, the frozen beast of the North!
- Goblin War: new special tournaments!
- Easter events & egg hunts!

- Leagues Expanded: now play with any Dragon!

NEW XXL DRAGON
This Winter in Dragonheim, things are getting stranger!
Anomalyis has landed - the aggressive extra-terrestrial with out-of-this-world eating power!

NEW XXL DRAGON
This Winter in Dragonheim, things are getting stranger!
Anomalyis has landed - the aggressive extra-terrestrial with out-of-this-world eating power!

Welcome to the Year of the Rat!
Hungry Dragon celebrates Lunar New Year with:
- Shu the Pet Rat: get extra gold every few seconds!
- Chinese Costumes: epic new looks for Blaze & Umbra!
- New Enemy: battle the fierce Nian Demon!

The 1st Update of the Decade!
- NEW DRAGON: Skully, bringer of mischief, resurrected from Viking bones!
- NEW AREA: The Space Area has had an out-of-this-world upgrade!

Eggsceptional Easter Update:
- NEW DRAGON: Don Drago has retired - make way for TONY DRAGONE!
- EASTERTIME: Eggscellent seasonal events!
- NEW SHOP: A brand new look for the in-game store!

UPDATE: The sun is out in Dragonheim this Summer!
- NEW DRAGON: Helion the Light, archangel warrior & bringer of Dragon dawn!
- SUMMER SEASONAL EVENTS!

THE VAMPIRE DRAGON HAS RISEN
Winner of the community Create a Dragon competition: Raktavi, countess of the night, has arrived!

IT'S HUNGRY HALLOWEEN!
- Creepy Costumes for Blaze, Poseidran & Draconis
- Defeat Zombies & Collect Pumpkins!
- Halloween Pets: Morta, Irving & Madwrap are back!

NEW XXL DRAGON
Geogantis, the primordial earth Dragon!
Risen from the mountain itself, strong and smart as solid rock.

The weather outside is frightful, but DRAGONS are always delightful!
Or at least hungry... MERRY CHRISTMAS from all of Dragonheim!
Festive events & Pets are now available!

2021 UPDATE - NEW XXL DRAGON
Celebrate the passing of 2020 with Jade, an ancient master returned from afar to bring aid in these unprecedented times!

2021 UPDATE - NEW XXL DRAGON
Celebrate the passing of 2020 with Jade, an ancient master returned from afar to bring aid in these unprecedented times!

2021 UPDATE - NEW XXL DRAGON
Celebrate the passing of 2020 with Jade, an ancient master returned from afar to bring aid in these unprecedented times!

IN THIS UPDATE:
Do you tire of fire? Now you can buy new flames for your Dragons!
Water jets, black lightning, poison clouds, LASERS - what will YOU choose?

IN THIS UPDATE:
- Do you tire of fire? Now you can buy new flames for your Dragons!
- Water jets, black lightning, poison clouds, LASERS - what will YOU choose?
- Live Events added & Bugs fried!
Various bug fixes and performance improvements

BOSS UPDATE:
Battle Dragonheim's first ever BOSS:
Octoni, the ancient octopus demon from the deep!
